alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper; Tidal Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 22 at 5:32AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...HAZARDOUS WINDS POSSIBLE ON AREA BRIDGES THIS MORNING... Gusty south to southwest winds will continue this morning ahead of an approaching cold front. Winds on some of the taller bridges and elevated roadways around the Charleston, Beaufort and Savannah Metro Areas could gust as high as 45 mph at times making for hazardous driving conditions, especially for high profile vehicles. Some of these bridges include, the Ravenel Bridge, the Don Holt Bridge, the James B. Edwards Bridge, the Ben Sawyer Bridge, the Isle of Palms connector, the Amos Nathaniel Rodgers Bridge, the McKinley Washington Junior Bridge, the Woods Memorial Bridge and the Talmadge Memorial Bridge. Winds will begin to diminish later this morning as a cold front sweeps offshore.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio All Hazards or the Internet for the latest information from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper; Tidal Berkeley
